alert.note: Alert for Far Northeast Highlands; Harding County; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Union County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 20 at 2:37PM MST until February 21 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 7 PM MST TUESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph possible. * WHERE...Far Northeast Highlands, Harding County, Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass, and Union County. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 8 AM to 7 PM MST Tuesday. For the High Wind Watch, from Wednesday morning through late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.

area.areaDesc: Far Northeast Highlands; Harding County; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Union County
